abstracts.cdata!:
The Tarlac Irrigation Project includes:
            (a) rehabilitation of three existing irrigation and drainage
            systems now serving a total of 21,000 ha; (b) extension of
            these systems to serve an additional area of about 13,000
            ha; (c) upgrading of about 55 km of existing project roads
            and construction of 370 km of additional roads; (d)
            procurement of vehicles and equipment; and (e) a groundwater
            irrigation pilot project, a National Irrigation Systems
            Improvement Study and a water management training program.
